deviceInfo.description: Property. Information about the device associated with the observations.

observationDateTime.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'. Last reported time of observation.

deviceStatus.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Indicates the status of physical device or devices.

atmosphericPressure.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Observed air (atmospheric or barometric) pressure.

airQualityIndex.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Overall Air Quality Index (AQI) for the observed air quality.

airQualityLevel.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Air Quality Category Indication. Qualitative level defined according to the local health agencies. For example, 'GOOD', 'MODERATE', 'POOR', 'UNHEALTHY', 'SEVERE', 'HAZARDOUS' etc.

aqiMajorPollutant.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Major pollutant in the Air Quality Index (AQI).

co2.description: Property. Observed value of environmental pollutant Carbon Dioxide (CO2). Value is an object containing attributes representing statistical aggregates derived from past data.

co.description: Property. Observed value of environmental pollutant Carbon Monoxide (CO). Value is an object containing attributes representing statistical aggregates derived from past data.

illuminance.description: Relationship. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'. Observed instantaneous ambient light intensity.

no2.description: Property. Observed value of environmental pollutant Nitrogen Dioxide (NO2). Value is an object containing attributes representing statistical aggregates derived from past data.

no.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'. Observed value of environmental pollutant Nitrogen Monoxide (NO). Value is an object containing attributes representing statistical aggregates derived from past data.

o3.description: Property. Observed value of environmental pollutant Ozone (O3). Value is an object containing attributes representing statistical aggregates derived from past data.

o2.description: Property. Observed value of Oxygen (O2). Value is an object containing attributes representing statistical aggregates derived from past data.

pm10.description: Property. Observed value of environmental pollutant Particulate Matter 10 (PM10). Value is an object containing attributes representing statistical aggregates derived from past data.

pm2p5.description: Property. Observed value of environmental pollutant Particulate Matter 2.5 (PM2.5). Value is an object containing attributes representing statistical aggregates derived from past data.

so2.description: Property. Observed value of environmental pollutant Sulphur Dioxide (SO2). Value is an object containing attributes representing statistical aggregates derived from past data.

benzene.description: Property. Observed value of environmental pollutant Benzene (C6H6). Value is an object containing attributes representing statistical aggregates derived from past data.

nh3.description: Property. Observed value of environmental pollutant Ammonia (NH3). Value is an object containing attributes representing statistical aggregates derived from past data.

pb.description: Property. Observed value of environmental pollutant Lead (Pb). Value is an object containing attributes representing statistical aggregates derived from past data.

bap.description: Property. Observed value of environmental pollutant Benzo[a]pyrene (BaP). Value is an object containing attributes representing statistical aggregates derived from past data.

nickel.description: Property. Observed value of environmental pollutant Nickel (Ni). Value is an object containing attributes representing statistical aggregates derived from past data.

arsenic.description: Property. Observed value of environmental pollutant Arsenic (As). Value is an object containing attributes representing statistical aggregates derived from past data.

ambientNoise.description: Property. Observed value of ambient noise levels. Value is an object containing attributes representing statistical aggregates derived from past data.

airTemperature.description: Property. Observed value of air temperature. Value is an object containing attributes representing statistical aggregates derived from past data.

uv.description: Property. Observed levels of UV radiation. Value is an object containing attributes representing statistical aggregates derived from past data.

precipitation.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Observed precipitation/rainfall level over a given duration.

versionInfo.description: Property. Version information corresponding to this observation.
